definitions.definition: Open (especially to something), unconcealed and/or unprotected (and therefore vulnerable , susceptible ).
examples: exposed to light; exposed to water; exposed to abuse; exposed to danger
The bike chain is open and exposed to tough environmental conditions such as temperature changes, humidity, rain, dirt and road salt.

main_definition: ( usually followed by to ) Open (especially to something), unconcealed and/or unprotected (and therefore vulnerable , susceptible ).
